name: Email Attachment by Order Status & Products
author: WebOccult Technologies Pvt Ltd

sections.description:
Email Attachment by Order Status & Products allow admin to send custom attachment to their customers when woocommerce status change notification email triggered

It provide admin facility to send product related information to their users after placed order like product manual or how to use product.

It also useful for booking type product to send pdf or document to users to provide accommodation and rules about their booking.

FEATURES

  • It allows admin to add one more attachment for order status.
  • It allows admin to add attachment by product type.
  • It allows admin to add attachment to single or multiple products.
  • It allow to add attachment by different languages when WPML is active.

STEPS TO USE

  • You have to add one or more attachment and order status you want to send attachment.
  • You can select product type or single product or multiple product option to add attachment for your specific need.
  • Upload attachment from media library
sections.installation:
WordPress

Search for “Email Attachment by Order Status & Products” and install with that slick Plugins > Add New back-end page.

… OR …

Follow these steps:

  1. Download the archive.

  2. Upload the zip file via the Plugins > Add New > Upload page … OR … unpack and upload with your favorite FTP client to the /plugins/ folder.

  3. Activate the plugin on the Plug-ins page.

  4. Add attachment from options **Woocommerce > Email Attachment by Orders Status

Done!
